name: Idle Fairy Fantasy
description:
Game Features:
1. There are currently three classes to choose from: Swordsmithing, Fa Smithing and Shadow smithing
2. Each class has 16 spells, which can be unlocked as the level increases.
3. Rich equipment system, equipment is divided into 5 levels, mythological level equipment can provide powerful passive skills
4. Fantasy system, different fantasy has different combat difficulty. Higher difficulty will result in higher probability of obtaining powerful equipment
5. Chain system, can refresh properties for equipment
6. The collected equipment system can be viewed in the cabinet
